components.name: accordion
components.description: A vertically stacked set of interactive headings that each reveal a section of content.

components.name: alert-dialog
components.description: A dialog component for important actions requiring confirmation

components.name: avatar
components.description: An image element with a fallback for representing the user

components.name: badge
components.description: Displays a simple and clean badge component

components.name: button
components.description: A button component with various styles and states

components.name: card
components.description: A card component for displaying content in a contained way

components.name: checkbox
components.description: A control that allows the user to toggle between checked and not checked

components.name: collapsible
components.description: A component that can be expanded or collapsed with smooth animation

components.name: combobox
components.description: An input with a list of suggestions that allows users to select an item

components.name: datepicker
components.description: A flexible date picker component for selecting dates with various display formats

components.name: dialog
components.description: A modal dialog component that provides a focused interaction with custom content

components.name: dropdown-menu
components.description: A menu that appears below a trigger element containing selectable options
